title: Disable Selection
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the world of CSS programming. The lab will provide hands-on experience in using CSS to style web pages and create visually appealing layouts. Participants will learn the fundamentals of CSS, including selectors, properties, and values, and apply this knowledge to complete a series of coding challenges. By the end of the lab, participants will have a solid understanding of CSS and be able to confidently use it to enhance the design of their web pages.
